summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1745, for the improvement of Westview Drive, from West McGraw Street to Eleventh Avenue West; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues therein named, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks and wooden crosswalks, together with the necessary drainage and connections to existing improvements, under Ordinance No. 18477, and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
